name: 1Code
description: An open-source Cursor-like UI for running Claude Code agents in parallel. Works on Mac (locally with worktrees) and Web (remote sandboxes with live previews). Dramatically speeds up feature development by running multiple trusted Claude Code agents simultaneously.
community_quotes: finally.. the TUI always jumps and jiggles, idk why anthropic cant fix it
Parallel agents only matter once you can trust them. GTWY is built around the same idea: scale intelligence by making execution predictable, not fragile.
NO WAY!!! LOVE IT SO MUCH
Running multiple Claude Code agents in parallel is a massive unlock for velocity compared to serial chats.
since we're utilizing Claude Code CLI under the hood, we accept everything that Claude Code CLI accepts

name: Cowork
description: Anthropic's general-purpose AI agent that extends Claude Code-style automation to desktop computing tasks. Built into Claude Desktop for Mac, allows users to designate a specific folder where Claude can read or modify files. Designed for knowledge workers including marketers and office workers, not just developers.
community_quotes: Claude Code for the rest of your work
Anthropic built Cowork in one and half weeks
more accessible and user-friendly than Claude Code
designed as a more user-friendly, accessible version of Claude Code for non-developers
